duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow all licensing guidelines and company standards to ensure the daily care of every child in your classroom.
Develop your ability to accurately observe, assess, and plan for children, as well as effectively communicate with families.
Complete extensive training that provides insight on child care, preschool, and development topics.
Implement our proprietary curriculum while creating fun, interactive learning experiences for the children.

education_certification.credential: Experience in a licensed childcare center or related field.
Ability to meet state requirements for education and our center requirements.
Able to work indoors or outdoors and engage in physical activity with children.
